name: projman
description: Sprint planning and project management with Gitea and Wiki.js integration

sprint-plan.description: Plan a new sprint with Gitea issues and Wiki.js documentation

sprint-start.description: Start sprint execution with orchestrator coordination

sprint-status.description: Get current sprint status and progress report

sprint-close.description: Close sprint and capture lessons learned

labels-sync.description: Sync label taxonomy from Gitea organization

initial-setup.description: Initialize projman configuration for a new project

planner.description: Architecture analysis and sprint planning agent

orchestrator.description: Sprint execution coordinator and progress tracker

executor.description: Implementation agent that follows execution prompts

label-taxonomy.description: Gitea label taxonomy reference for issue classification
